amendment.description: Amendment provides that, as part of the selection criteria, the small business administrator would examine the extent to which the investment company would concentrate its investment capital on targeted industries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to include as part of the selection criteria for investment companies the extent to which the applicant will concentrate investment activities on small business concerns in targeted industries.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
